analysis.description:
Reentrancy in LuckchemyCrowdsale.processPrivatePurchase (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#225-254):
	External calls:
	- payoutTokens(beneficiary,tokensToBuy,usedWei) (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#246-250)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStage (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#251)

Reentrancy in LuckchemyCrowdsale.processPublicPurchase (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#258-299):
	External calls:
	- payoutTokens(beneficiary,tokensToBuy,usedWei) (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#286-287)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- currentStage (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#299)

LuckchemyCrowdsale.payoutTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#303-318) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,tokenAmount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#314)

LuckchemyCrowdsale.payFiat (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#333-356) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#353-355)

LuckchemyCrowdsale.processPublicPurchase has external calls inside a loop:
	- beneficiary.transfer(leftWei) (/unique_chucks/6/0x18777aec0b231d1a4a9c66b51253088a03affdfc.sol#294)
